originalTitle: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
title: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
content: The government has begun a vaccination programme but officials have been blamed for a slow response.

title: Son of Robert Mugabe arrested in South Africa on suspicion of attempted murder
content: Bellarmine Mugabe is in custody after a man who worked at the place where he was staying was shot and injured.

title: Islamist militants accused of killing 34 in raids on Nigerian villages
content: The gunmen launched simultaneous assaults on multiple communities in a remote border district, officials say.

title: Three aid workers killed, 4 wounded in RSF drone attack in Sudan’s Kordofan
content: The attack comes as the UN releases a report which found that RSF actions have hallmarks of genocide in el-Fasher.

originalTitle: Trump orders Pentagon, federal agencies to release files on UFOs and aliens
title: Trump orders Pentagon, federal agencies to release files on UFOs and aliens
content: US president's announcement comes amid a surge of interest following comments on aliens by ex-President Barack Obama.

title: Deadly tower collapse has locals in Lebanon’s Tripoli asking: Are we next?
content: February 8 collapse killed at least 15 people in Lebanon's second city, where buildings are in poor condition.

title: Trump says world has 10 days to see if Iran agrees deal or 'bad things happen'
content: The US is surging forces to the Middle East amid negotiations with the Islamic Republic over its nuclear programme.

originalTitle: Sudan atrocities are 'hallmarks of genocide', UN says
title: Sudan atrocities are 'hallmarks of genocide', UN says
content: A UN fact-finding mission issued the report after investigating the capture of el-Fasher by the Rapid Support Forces.

title: Grey's Anatomy star Eric Dane dies at 53 after ALS diagnosis
content: The actor, who also starred in HBO's Euphoria, battled the most common form of motor neurone disease.

title: I want Guardiola to stay at Man City - Rooney
content: Former Manchester United captain Wayne Rooney says he hopes Pep Guardiola will stay at Manchester City beyond this season because he has set 'a benchmark' for all other managers.
